basics.name: SPECIALIST OF INFANTRY
basics.label: Social Services Provider
basics.summary: Professional learning, occupational consultant and life-skills counselor seeking a position as a Social Services Provider. Disabled veteran and education specialist conversant with social and personal barriers to employment, civic life and independent living.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Maintained and operated weapons and communications systems of the $3,000,000 M2A2 Bradley Infantry Fighting Vehicle. Maintained mechanical functions and marksman qualification for the M16 service rifle. Trained in Infantry tactics according to Army doctrine on Fire and Maneuver.
highlights: Battalion Soldier of the Month honors
Maintained personal physical fitness for military duty.
Leadership and training for subordinate soldiers

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Researched and identified vendors for commercial equipment, parts and supplies for infrastructure/building maintenance by work order. Data entry and procurement of commercial freight. Received, inspected, offloaded, warehoused and data entered commercial freight into inventory.
highlights: Managed accounts and inventory for contract tools and equipment via database
Processed defective product for return and reclamations

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Maintained and repaired power plant/engine systems and subsystems of the $24,000,000 MH53E Helicopter. Conducted pre-flight maintenance and safety inspections. Facilitated launch and recovery of aircraft as part of a ground crew.
highlights: Handled and disposed of hazardous material in accordance with local, State and Federal regulations
Maintained personal physical fitness for military duty.
